tabs

默认样式
  • hello
  • world
  • china
		
	<div class="ndp-tab-wrapper" name="plain-tab">
		<ul class="nav nav-tabs nav-tabs-cus" style="left:0;">
			<li role="presentation" value="hello" index="0" class="active"><a href="#">hello</a></li>
			<li role="presentation" value="world" index="1"><a href="#">world</a></li>
			<li role="presentation" value="china" index="2"><a href="#">china</a></li>
		</ul>
	</div>
纵向的tabs
  • hello
  • world
  • china
		
ul.nav.nav-tabs-cus>li{
	width: 150px;
	clear:both;
}
ul.nav.nav-tabs-cus>li.active>a{
	border-width: 0;
	border-left:2px solid #fac925;
	border-top:1px solid #ccc;
	border-bottom:1px solid #ccc;
}
